text: Dependency has a number of meanings: * Dependency theory *In project management, a dependency is a link amongst a project's terminal elements. *In computer science, dependency is a state in which one object uses the functions of another object. * Dependency theory is an economic worldview. * A dependent area is a classification of territory. * A dependent territory. * Co-dependency is a state of behaviour. * A chemical dependency is such a strong need for a substance in order for an animal (usually a person) to function properly. * A former or current colony, such as those governed by the United Kingdom.
title: Dependency
